I got the white in these shorts and I love them, it's very comfortable and flattering. The fabric is great and there's enough stretch to them, it also washes well and dry fast as well. Keep in mind the elastic is in the back so the front does NOT stretch. Very comfortable and breathable material that dries fast.

The ELLEVEN Women's Y2K High-Waisted Cargo Shorts are a stylish addition to any wardrobe. With their slim fit and high-waisted design, they offer a flattering silhouette that's both trendy and comfortable. The inclusion of pockets adds functionality without compromising on style. Whether you're running errands or hanging out with friends, these cargo shorts are sure to become a go-to favorite for effortless summer style.
Cute shorts. Good quality but size up because they’re a bit too short
These shorts are comfy and easy to wear. They sit at a nice length for the summertime. Can go with anything.

These are cute, stylish, very lightweight, comfortable, stretchy and they move well with you. The material is very good, they fit well no need to size up or down, doesn't shrink whenever washed. Great value for the money.
I love these shorts! They look and feel great on me!

What I used this product for was to try a new trendy clothing style. I love cargo pants and other bottoms with a similar design style. What I like about this product is the nice khaki color that goes well with everything. I also like that this product can be mixed and matched to be elevated or made to be more casual. These are comfortable with average elasticity. I like that they are true to size, and that they fit in a flattering way. They are worth the money, I really like they way I look in these cargo shorts.

The pink color is beautiful, they wash well, and they have a ton of stretch in the waist.  But the material is not cargo but also not stretchable making the but and thigh area tight.  They would look better a little looser since they aren't forgiving, but then the waist gets too big. I also don't like the big brown button on the front of the pink shorts.  It doesn't match and isn't needed.  Overall a 3/5 but I think you need really thin legs/butt for it to look more like cargo shorts and less like booty shorts
Muy pequeño y la tela no estira. El color es hermoso y el estilo también.
I love these shorts because they're high waisted and they're cargo. I also love how the big pockets are on the side. The material doesn't look cheap. They also goes great with sandals.
I love these shorts. I'm extremely thin, and I love how these shorts have a stretch waist band to get a good fit.  Great color and material.  I highly recommend these.
One of my favorite shorts from amazon so far ! It's comfortable and perfect fit .. TRUE TO SIZE!

评论概述: Dont love them, dont hate them
评论详情: I feel indifferent about the shorts. The waist is super stretchy, which I was actually very surprised about. However, the legs seem pretty tight around my thighs. The material is thin, but not so thin that it is see-through. If you have a lower belly pooch, these might not be the best for you unless you’re planning on wearing a loose T-shirt as they are definitely not flattering for that type of body shape. the button hits below my belly button im 5’1 for reference) If I could purchase these again, I would probably size up one size

These shorts fit really nice. Soft cargo material. The color matched the pictures shown. They’re short, but won’t show your business. They come with a replacement button. They have a pocket on each side and ruching on the waist. Worth the money.

The ELLEVEN Women's Y2K High-Waisted Cargo Shorts have quickly become a staple in my wardrobe. From the moment I slipped them on, I was impressed by their comfort. The material feels nice and boasts a beautiful khaki color, they exude style and ease.  As someone who stands at 5'3" and weighs 109lbs, I opted for the size small, and it fits nicely. The high-waisted design not only flatters the figure but also provides a comfortable fit. Plus, the inclusion of side pockets adds a trendy touch that I absolutely adore.  What sets these shorts apart is their versatility. Thanks to the chic belt loop, I can effortlessly transition from a laid-back summer day look to a more sophisticated ensemble by simply adding a belt and a nice blouse. Whether I'm running errands or meeting friends for brunch, these shorts effortlessly complement any occasion.  While I did notice a few loose threads here and there, it doesn't detract from the overall quality and comfort of these shorts. I find myself reaching for them time and time again, appreciating their comfort and style with each wear. Overall, the ELLEVEN Women's Y2K High-Waisted Cargo Shorts are a must-have addition to any wardrobe.

The shorts fit and looked very nice. They were comfortable to wear and I like that they fit the belly area with the stretchy stitch around the waist. Goes well with any blouse or tshirt. I got white, and they are alittle more see through then I thought, I should have gotten another color.

These shorts are stylish, comfortable, well made and just an all around lovely prioduct. They have pockets and my wife loves the cargo shorts design. This is the sort of thing you could wear to the supermarket, out by the pool, or out and about. They go with almost any sort of top as well which is great. They are made from great materials and should last a very long time. Strong recommend!

I love them. It’s been a while since i have found short that fit me this good, most of the time they’re too loose around the waist or to tight for my legs but these are just right. I’m Obsessed! Very confortable, i will be wearing them a lot. If you have a big booty and you want a little more room I recommend to size up.

Great slightly high waisted shorts. This style is perfect for me - I have a very high waste and broad hips so high wasted styles are perfect for me. The length of the shorts is exactly as pictured. Small was a great fit for me - I'm 5'4", 115#.

评论概述: The sizing is off and not very form-fitting.
评论详情: I got this for my wifey who's 5' 3" and ~105 lbs, and the cargo shorts is not very form-fitting, waist hugging, and slim fit as pictured.  The material is not soft and not that comfortable.  Overall, it looks better in pictures than in person.  Normally small size fits her fine, but this small size is a little tight.  In summary, it does not flatter the body and only gets 3 stars.

These are so cute, they are short shorts. I ordered a medium which is my usual size, but after looking at the measurements a large would have been perfect. The medium does fit me in the waist, but it is a little tight on my butt and since the material has no stretch the size up would have been better. With saying that if you get the correct size these are so cute!
Cute shorts, I ordered according to the size chart and they fir perfect. They are easy slide ons, the quality is great and they feel like a sportsy material.

I was worried these were too small when they arrived, but after trying on, they are a perfect fit!  These are very comfortable as well.  The material is kinda stretchy, which helped with the waist part. I like that these have the cute cargo pockets, and they seem very well made. I haven't washed them yet, so we shall see how that goes.  They are very short, so I'd recommend a size up if you are a bit more curvy. Overall, I really like these.
these shorts were very cheap and they came ripped and they are not taking them back! Do not buy!

I was pleasantly surprised when I received these. The stretchy waistband with the button that fastens make it comfortable but also look nice. As a short girly it comes up over my bellybutton which I like. I would say they are 3?ish inches long. I am normally a size 10 in pants (165lb, curvy muscle and 5,1) and I got a size large. They are short enough that I do experience a little bit of chub rub but they are a nice fabric so it’s not as bad. Will be ordering in more colors.
